definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: What I wear depends on the time of the day and thd places that I am going to.
sentences.chinese: 我的穿着是根據當天的時刻和我要去的地點來決定。

sentences.english: So the place site of fable "the ass of Qian "have nothing to Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: “黔之驢”寓言故事發生地點，完全與貴州無關。

sentences.english: Nor do we have any evidence in any other historical place.
sentences.chinese: 其他歷史地點也沒有任何證據。

sentences.english: We can refund the full fare ticket for you.
sentences.chinese: 您的客票限制在原出票地點退票。

sentences.english: Anyone confirmed to buy, pls leave your moblle number, time and location.
sentences.chinese: 如肯定買，請留電話，時間，地點。

sentences.english: This torch is then carried by a relay of runners to the site of the Summer or Winter games.
sentences.chinese: 之後這支火炬由跑者接力送至夏季或冬季比賽地點。

sentences.english: The Soko Islands were a favorite destination.
sentences.chinese: 索罟羣島是最理想的地點。

sentences.english: A polling station is where I vote and is listed on my Elector Information Card.
sentences.chinese: 投票站是我前往投票的地方，在選民登記列明地點。

sentences.english: The position will be based mainly in SiHui city & Foshan, Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 工作地點主要是在廣東佛山三水四會市。

sentences.english: We appointed the school-house as place for the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我們確定校舍爲會面地點。

sentences.english: Here's a list of all the checkins I did in Zurich, for example.
sentences.chinese: 例如，下面是我在蘇黎世記錄的全部地點的列表。

sentences.english: Rescue workers rushed to the site.
sentences.chinese: 營救人員趕往雪崩地點。

sentences.english: The fire was warm, however, and the nursery dimly lit by three night-lights, and presently the sewing lay on Mrs.
sentences.chinese: 爐火暖融融的，育兒室裏半明半暗地點着三盞夜燈。

sentences.english: Follow this up with a succinct description of the location followed by a dash and a time reference.
sentences.chinese: 接着，簡要地說明地點，然後用一個破折號提及時間。

sentences.english: So I'm on the road a bit, and I hold meetings, sometimes at the client's place.
sentences.chinese: 我纔剛剛起步，有時候我在客戶提供的地點開會。

definition: to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]

local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
